items.sentence: I don't think Tom knows he isn't supposed to do that.
Don't pretend that you don't know what this is about.
Tom was the one who told me I didn't have to do that.
China is the largest country situated wholly in Asia.
Tom will have to do that, whether he likes it or not.
Tom and I won't see each other again for a long time.
If you tell Tom how to do that, I'm sure he'll do it.
I wonder if Tom has ever asked Mary why she did that.
Tom locked himself in his bedroom and started to cry.
Tom started coughing and everyone began to move away.
